docs.summary: Creates a URL for redirecting a visitor or member from an external Wix Headless client site to a Wix page for Wix-managed functionality.
description:
The Create Redirect Session endpoint enables your external Wix Headless client site, built on any platform, to let Wix take care of frontend functionality for specific processes,
including authentication, as well as checkouts for bookings, eCommerce, events, and paid plans.

For each purpose, call Create Redirect Session with the relevant information to enable Wix to take care of one specific process, and provide a callback URL, so Wix can redirect
the user back to the appropriate page on your site.

Redirect your visitor or member to the URL provided in the response, which includes query parameters informing Wix where to redirect the visitor or member back to on the Wix Headless client site

params.name: clientId
params.doc: The oauth app id used in order to pull the allowed domains from, has to correspond to the same metasite as the site in context

docs.summary: Validates a callback url per the allowed domains defined for a given client id

members.name: clientId
members.doc: client_id is the unique identifier of the client application.

members.name: codeChallenge
members.doc:
code_challenge is the code challenge sent by the client as part of the PKCE
process. This field is only used if response_type is "code".

members.name: codeChallengeMethod
members.doc:
code_challenge_method is the code challenge method sent by the client as part
of the PKCE process. This field is only used if response_type is "code".

members.name: error
members.doc:
Optional fields for errors
A short error code that describes the type of error that occurred (e.g. "invalid_request")

members.name: errorDescription
members.doc: A human-readable description of the error that occurred

members.name: redirectUri
members.doc:
redirect_uri is the URI to which the authorization server will redirect the
user-agent after the user grants/denies permission.

members.name: responseMode
members.doc: (Optional) How the result of the authorization request is formatted

members.name: responseType
members.doc:
response_type specifies the desired authorization grant type.
This can be "code" for the authorization code.

members.name: scope
members.doc:
scope is a space-delimited string that specifies the requested scope of the
access request.

members.name: sessionToken
members.doc: Current client session

members.name: state
members.doc:
An opaque value, used for security purposes. If this request parameter is set
in the request, then it is returned to the application as part of the redirect_uri.

description:
AuthorizeRequest is sent by the client to the authorization server to initiate
the authorization process.

members.name: bookOnlineDisabled
members.doc: Bookings policy violation. Online booking is disabled for this slot.

members.name: tooEarlyToBook
members.doc: Bookings policy violation. Too early to book this slot.

members.name: tooLateToBook
members.doc: Bookings policy violation. Too late to book this slot.

members.name: bookingsServiceListUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom bookings services page implemented outside of Wix.

Default: If you don't pass a URL, a Wix bookings services page is used.

members.name: cartPageUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom eCommerce cart page implemented outside of Wix.

Default: If you don't pass a URL, a Wix cart page is used.

members.name: loginUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom login page implemented outside of Wix.

Default: If you don't pass a URL, a Wix login page is used.

members.name: planListUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom pricing plans page implemented outside of Wix.

Default: If you don't pass a URL, a Wix pricing plans page is used.

members.name: postFlowUrl
members.doc:
The URL Wix should redirect the visitor or member to when the Wix-managed process is completed, abandoned, or interrupted.

**Note**: For an authentication redirect, you don't need to pass a URL here. Instead, pass one in `auth.authRequest.redirectUri`.

members.name: thankYouPageUrl
members.doc:
The URL for a custom thank you page implemented on a site outside of Wix. The visitor or member is directed to this page at the end of the Wix-managed process.
If the process is abandoned or interrupted, the visitor or member is redirected to the URL specified in `postFlowUrl`.

Default: If you don't pass a URL, the visitor or member is redirected to a Wix thank you page, and from there to the URL specified in `postFlowUrl`.

members.name: auth
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for Wix authentication.

members.name: bookingsCheckout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for a Wix Bookings checkout.

members.name: callbacks
members.doc: Details of pages to redirect the visitor or member back to on the Wix Headless client site. **Note:** When redirecting for authentication, do not pass a callback URL here.

members.name: ecomCheckout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for a Wix eCommerce checkout.

members.name: eventsCheckout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for a Wix Events checkout.

members.name: login
members.doc: Pass an empty object in this parameter to generate a URL for Wix login without first checking whether the visitor is authenticated.

members.name: logout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL to log out from a Wix account. This process invalidates the visitor or member token and clears cookies associated with the Wix domain from their browser.

members.name: paidPlansCheckout
members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for a Wix Paid Plans checkout.

members.name: preferences
members.doc: Optional preferences for customizing redirection to Wix pages.

members.doc: Information required for generating a custom URL for Wix authentication.

members.name: redirectSession
members.doc: Details for redirecting the visitor or member to a Wix page.

members.name: accountPagePath
members.doc: Path of the account page in the site's members area. Required if `useGenericWixPages` is `false` and the account page path has been changed in the Wix editor.

members.name: profilePagePath
members.doc: Path of the member profile page in the site's members area. Required if `useGenericWixPages` is `false` and the member profile page path has been changed in the Wix editor.

members.name: _id
members.doc:
Business location ID. Available only for locations that are business locations,
meaning the `location_type` is `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`.

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: The full address of this location.

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Location type.

- `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`: The business address, as set in the siteâ€™s general settings.
- `"OWNER_CUSTOM"`: The address as set when creating the service.
- `"CUSTOM"`: The address as set for the individual session.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location name.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the redirect session created.

members.name: fullUrl
members.doc: The full URL of the Wix page to redirect the visitor or member to. This URL includes query parameters informing Wix where to redirect the visitor or member back to on the Wix Headless client site.

description: Information for redirecting a visitor or member from an external Wix Headless client site to a Wix page for Wix-managed functionality.

members.name: authRequest
members.doc: Required.** The authorization request to send to the authorization server.

members.name: auth
members.doc: (Required) The authorization request to be sent to the authorization server

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: Required.** ID of the service for which to select the slot. Use [Query Services](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/services-v2/query-services) to obtain a service ID.

members.name: slotAvailability
members.doc: Required.** The calendar slot to check out.

members.name: timezone
members.doc: The timezone to use when presenting the selected slot to users, in [tz database](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones) format. For example, `America/Santiago`.

members.name: checkoutId
members.doc: Required.** ID of the checkout to process. Use [Create Checkout From Cart](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-ecommerce/cart/create-checkout-from-cart) to create a checkout and obtain an ID.

members.name: eventSlug
members.doc: Required.** URL-friendly event slug, generated from the event title of the event. For example, `my-event-4`. Use [Query Events](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/event/query-events) to obtain an event slug.

members.name: reservationId
members.doc: Required.** ID of the temporary event reservation. Use [Create Reservation](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/checkout/create-reservation) to reserve a ticket temporarily and obtain a reservation ID.

members.name: clientId
members.doc: Required.** ID of the OAuth app authorizing the client.

members.name: section
members.doc:
The member account page to redirect to.

Default: `ACCOUNT_INFO`

members.name: checkoutData
members.doc:
For use when pricing plan selection is part of a checkout flow and the paid plan selection page is implemented on the external Wix Headless client site.
In this case, a string is passed to the external pricing plans page as `checkoutData` query parameter. Pass this string here when redirecting back to Wix.

members.name: planId
members.doc: Required.** ID of the paid plan selected. Use [Query Public Plans](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-pricing-plans/pricing-plans/plans/query-public-plans) to obtain a paid plan ID.

members.name: useGenericWixPages
members.doc:
Whether to use a standard Wix template for Wix pages the visitor is redirected to. Set to `false` only if your client connects with a Wix site that has custom pages.

Default: `true`

members.name: clientId
members.doc: The oauth app id used in order to pull the allowed domains from, has to correspond to the same metasite as the site in context

members.name: redirectSession
members.doc: The Wix URL details to redirect into

members.name: endDate
members.doc:
The end time of this slot in
[RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339) format.

If `timezone` is specified,
dates are based on the local date/time. This means that the timezone offset
in the `end_date` is ignored.

members.name: location
members.doc: Geographic location of the slot.

members.name: resource
members.doc:
The resource required for this slot. Currently, the only supported resource
is the relevant staff member for the slot.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule ID.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: Service ID.

members.name: sessionId
members.doc:
ID for the slot's corresponding session, when the session is either a single session
or a specific session generated from a recurring session.

members.name: startDate
members.doc:
The start time of this slot in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339)
format.

If `timezone` is specified,
dates are based on the local date/time. This means that the timezone offset
in the `start_date` is ignored.

members.name: timezone
members.doc:
The timezone for which slot availability is to be calculated.

Learn more about [handling Daylight Savings Time (DST) for local time zones](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/availability-calendar/query-availability#wix-bookings_availability-calendar_query-availability_handling-daylight-savings-time-dst-for-local-time-zones)
when calculating availability.

members.name: bookable
members.doc:
Whether the slot is bookable. Bookability is determined by checking a
session's open slots and booking policies. Locks are not taken into
account.

members.name: bookingPolicyViolations
members.doc: Booking policy violations for the slot.

members.name: locked
members.doc:
Indicates whether the slot is locked because a waitlist exists.
When a slot frees up, the slot is offered to the next customer on the waitlist. Read-only.

members.name: openSpots
members.doc: Number of open spots for this slot.

members.name: slot
members.doc:
The slot for the corresponding session, when the session is either a single session
or a specific session generated from a recurring session.

members.name: totalSpots
members.doc:
Total number of spots for this slot.
For example, if a session has a total of 10 spots and 3 spots are booked,
`spotsTotal` is 10 and `openSpots` is 7.

members.name: waitingList
members.doc: An object describing the slot's waitlist and its occupancy.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Resource ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource name. Read only.

members.name: callbackType
members.doc: The type of the callback URL

members.name: callbackUrl
members.doc: An external URL to validate

members.name: clientId
members.doc: The oauth app id used in order to pull the allowed domains from, has to correspond to the same metasite as the site in context

members.name: isValid
members.doc: is the provided url allowed for the given client id

members.name: callbackType
members.doc: The type of the callback URL

members.name: clientId
members.doc: The oauth app id used in order to pull the allowed domains from, has to correspond to the same metasite as the site in context

members.name: openSpots
members.doc: Number of open spots for this waitlist.

members.name: totalSpots
members.doc:
Total number of spots and open spots for this waitlist.
For example, a Yoga class with 10 waitlist spots and 3 registered
on the waitlist has 10 `total_spots` and 7 `open_spots`.
